what: Compile and run a TreePPL program — run_treeppl
title: Compile and run a TreePPL program — run_treeppl
Compile and run a TreePPL program — run_treeppl
code: run_treeppl(   dir = NULL,   source = NULL,   method = "smc-bpf",   data = NULL,   samples = 1000 )

title: Compile and run a TreePPL program — run_treeppl
text: dir directory contains TreePPL code input file. executable output files written . source Name file TreePPL program. method Inference method used. data Name object input data. samples number samples inference.

title: Compile and run a TreePPL program — run_treeppl
text: data frame sampled values, log weights, normalized weights, normalizing constant samples.

title: Compile and run a TreePPL program — run_treeppl
code: if (FALSE) {   coinflips <- tibble(coinflips = sample(c(TRUE, FALSE), 20, replace = TRUE))   output <- run_treeppl(dir = system.file("extdata", package = "treepplr"),                         source = "coin.tppl", data = coinflips, samples = 10)   if(rlang::is_installed("ggplot2")) {     ggplot2::ggplot(output) +     ggplot2::geom_col(ggplot2::aes(.data$samples, .data$nweights), width = 0.005) +     ggplot2::theme_bw()   } }

what: treepplr: R Interface to TreePPL — treepplr-package
title: treepplr: R Interface to TreePPL — treepplr-package
treepplr: R Interface to TreePPL — treepplr-package
TreePPL example files — treepplr_example
text: path Optional. Name example file. NULL, returns list example files. extdata directory.

title: TreePPL example files — treepplr_example
text: list files path one example file.

title: TreePPL example files — treepplr_example
code: treepplr_example() #> [1] "coin.tppl" treepplr_example("coin.json") #> Error in system.file("extdata", path, package = "treepplr", mustWork = TRUE): no file found
